availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Levi W. Brown (Henderson County, Kentucky, tailor and jailor)

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, tailor and jailor. Maryland native. Tailor in Henderson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Jailor of the Henderson County Jail in Henderson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States_ (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, District 1, p. 280 A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Division 1, p. 37.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Henderson County Administrators Bonds, 1853-1867, p. 41.
